{{ddcl | header=experimental/simd | since=parallelism_ts_2 | 1=
struct vector_aligned_tag {};
inline constexpr vector_aligned_tag vector_aligned{};
}}

This tag type indicates that the buffer of {{c|copy_from}} and {{c|copy_to}} is aligned to {{c|memory_alignment_v&lt;T, U&gt;}}, where the copy operation operates on the {{c|simd}}/{{c|simd_mask}} type T, and the buffer with element type U.

===Notes===

This tag type allows to implement vector-aligned load and store.
